titles.title: Your mercy Lord it reaches to the heavens

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Your mercy Lord it reaches to the heavens
Your faithfulness it reaches to the clouds
Your word O Lord endureth throughout ages
Your mighty power no evil can withstand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And who am I that you should be mindful of me?
Who am I that you should be mindful of me?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I am crucified
I am raised with You
I'm seated in Christ Jesus in heavenly places
Death has lost its sting
And the grave its victory
I'm alive, I'm alive
Not I but Christ in me
You knew me from the start
And you have me on Your heart

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Your mercy Lord it leads me and restores me
Your faithfulness it walks here by my side
Your word O Lord inhabits and sustains me
Your might power upholds me in the storm

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And I am Yours because You are mindful of me
I am Yours because You are mindful of me

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
And I am graven on Your palms
Your blood was shed for me
What can I do to honour You?
But give my life anew
